name: Coda (itch)
description:
Created by Matt Cooper and Lauren Perugini.

Coda was built for a Game Jam hosted by Heartbeast (Heart Game Jam).  The game is first-person exploration  centered around scarcity of oxygen and power.  The two of us designed the story and created and published the game in one weekend in March, 2018.

Matt Cooper: Artwork, Sound, & Music

Lauren Perugini: Programming & Story

Additional Textures were used free from Nobiax.
